projectsJson.title: ReportIt - Authentication and User Management - Ruby on Rails
projectsJson.descriptionLong1: This is part of the capstone project for my Master's program and was developed with two teammates. I designed and developed the user authentication system using the Devise gem and expanding upon it to allow for admin user account management and different user roles.
projectsJson.descriptionLong2: Users who create an account through the signup form are automatically assigned a role of Resident. Admin users can then grant them Official or Admin privileges as needed. Official and Admin features are restricted from Residents, and Admin-only features are restricted from all other user types. Unauthenticated users may view reports but cannot add reports.
projectsJson.descriptionLong3: Admin and Official users may view report history by user to better moderate the site and make decisions on report severity and priority.
projectsJson.descriptionShort: A key feature of this application is the authentication system, allowing for signup, user administration, and access to restricted areas by role.
